name: Trash Stan
summary: Step into the shoes of Stan, a lovable troublemaker sentenced to community service for being ‘naughty.’ Armed with your trusty trash picker, it’s your job to clean up the town from the park to the...dungeon?  But this isn’t your ordinary cleanup—go from trash collector to roach wrangler and more as Stan's community service rolls on.  Unlock new pickers, decorate your space, and prove you can clean up your act—literally!
